        Calling this Setter function sets current user

      • createDatabase

        public boolean createDatabase(java.lang.String accountFile)
        This method creates a proper database if existing one is empty or doesn't exist
        Parameters:
        accountFile - of the location and name of userdatabase csv file to be created: CSVfiles/trial.csv
        Returns:
        a boolean, true if userdatabase was successfully created, false otherwise

      • userExists

        public boolean userExists(java.lang.String user)
        This method check if a given username already exists in the database on the event when a new user is trying to open an account in the Bomberman game.
        Parameters:
        user -
        Returns:
        a boolean, true if username already exists, false otherwise

      • createUser

        public boolean createUser(java.lang.String[] userData)
        This method adds the new user information to the existing database.
        Parameters:
        userData - An array of type String containing user information inputted by user from Sign up page
        Returns:
        a boolean, true if user was successfully created, false otherwise

      • removeUser

        public boolean removeUser(User user)
        This method remove a user from the existing database on the request of the user. This function is called when the user would like to delete his account.
        Parameters:
        user -
        Returns:
        a boolean, true if user was successfully removed, false otherwise

      • modifyProfile

        public boolean modifyProfile(java.lang.String[] userData)
        This method allows a user to modify his real name and password. The user does not have the option to modify his username
        Parameters:
        userData - An array of type String containing the information the user would like modified
        Returns:
        a boolean, true if the user information was successfully modified, false otherwise

      • updateDatabase

        public boolean updateDatabase()

      • updateScore

        public boolean updateScore(int score)
        This method updates the current user's score in the user database and current user object when called.
        Parameters:
        score - An integer containing the score field to update
        Returns:
        a boolean, true if the score was successfully updated, false otherwise

      • setUnlockedLevel

        public boolean setUnlockedLevel(int unlockedLevel)
        This method updates the current user's number of Unlocked levels when called.
        Parameters:
        unlockedLevel - An integer containing the unlocked level field to update
        Returns:
        a boolean, true if the unlocked level was successfully updated, false otherwise

      • getCurrentUser

        public User getCurrentUser()
        This getter function returns the current user
        Returns:
        User

      • login

        public boolean login(java.lang.String userName,
                     java.lang.String password)
        This method searches the database csv file to check if the user trying to sign in currently holds an account. It matches the inputted username and password with the user information in the database.
        Parameters:
        userName -
        password -
        Returns:
        a boolean, true if the login credentials matched, false otherwise
